title: vi's q 2/3 or more charged will now break through walls causing a temporary breach
body: this would be really cool change to vi's kit that would really kit her lore and quotes, although it might be a slight nerf

replies.body:
you know, like vi should be able to literally break down a wall like her lore suggests

sometimes you gotta make a door {{champion:254}}

Map alteration is not written in Leagues code thus far..

So probs never going to happen son.

Unless perhaps is was just some fancy overlay that just has a short range Magical Journey effect on terrain.

I guess so, but really anything is possible with a but of programming knowledge and some creativity. of course i don't want map alteration to become a thing. but it would be nice to have a little something extra once and a while.
This is a stupid idea and you are stupid.
that you for leaving a short lackluster comment but says nothing about why this may be a bad idea instead of giving me actual reasons.
Riot hasn't even announced a new Client for League yet. I don't think they're going to attempt to programme in something that will take a lot of time and resources yet.
